translation.ja: ジュディの息子について 知ることができた

translation.en: He got his moles checked. He's fine.
translation.ja: メラノーマ検査を受けたって

translation.en: Our moms are working around the clock, ready whenever, wherever, to send you instant alerts
translation.ja: 情報を即座に伝えるために 母親たちが24時間体制で勤務

translation.en: as soon as the news breaks,
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた 昔の出来事も あえて警告 我々が忘れかけた 昔の出来事も あえて警告 〝テッド･バンディ〞

translation.en: and delayed warnings that come several years later
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた 昔の出来事も あえて警告 〝テッド･バンディ〞 我々が忘れかけた 昔の出来事も あえて警告

translation.en: about something they kind of remember.
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた 昔の出来事も あえて警告

translation.en: Life- or- death news alerts
translation.ja: 生死に関わる情報以外にも 生死に関わる情報以外にも 〝レーズンを購入〞

translation.en: the way you want them,
translation.ja: 生死に関わる情報以外にも 〝レーズンを購入〞

translation.en: sandwiched between cryptic, mundane updates
translation.ja: 〝ダラスで火災〞 平々凡々で不可解な 情報の受信も可能 平々凡々で不可解な 情報の受信も可能

translation.en: about other things.
translation.ja: 平々凡々で不可解な 情報の受信も可能 〝ジョアンを？〞

translation.en: And sign up for Mom Alert Premium to hear audio warnings with even more detail.
translation.ja: プレミアム通知なら 音声警告も受けられる

translation.en: Valeria said it has a bad battery.
translation.ja: 記事を読んだけど 電池のせいだと思うわ

translation.en: Or something. I don't remember.
translation.ja: 記事を読んだけど 電池のせいだと思うわ 誰かの口の中で 爆発したそう

translation.en: And it exploded in someone's mouth.
translation.ja: 誰かの口の中で 爆発したそう

translation.en: Blew up their whole head. Or something like that.
translation.ja: どうやら 頭が吹っ飛んだみたい

translation.en: It's a lawsuit. Did you see this?
translation.ja: 訴訟になったって話よ

translation.en: Anyway, just calling to make sure that you don't have that toothbrush.
translation.ja: ところで 例の歯ブラシは持ってる？

translation.en: Thanks, Mom Alerts?
translation.ja: これが便利なの？

translation.en: And coming soon, Dad Alert.
translation.ja: パパアラートも配信予定

translation.en: - - Hey, buddy.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: It's just this message. Twice a day. Nothing else.
translation.ja: この通知が １日に２回 届くだけだ

translation.en: Wow! We made that. Huh?
translation.ja: すばらしいＣＭになった

translation.en: Wow! Right?
translation.ja: 本当にすごいだろ？

translation.en: I mean, goes without saying, and yet here I am saying it, we are so pleased with how this campaign is being received.
translation.ja: 言うまでもないことだが 僕は人々の反応に満足してる

translation.en: Right? Bridget, do you care to walk us through some of the roll- out details?
translation.ja: ブリジット 詳細を説明してくれ

translation.en: So, we launched last month across digital,
translation.ja: 先月から キャンペーンを展開した

translation.en: traditional, streaming, and even print.
translation.ja: 映像だけではなく 印刷物も使用してね

translation.en: - Ooh! - It was a bold strategy, but the numbers are really paying off.
translation.ja: 大胆な戦略だけど いい数字が出てるわ

translation.en: - Incredible. - Okay!
translation.ja: 最高だね

translation.en: That is really exciting stuff. - I'll take it. - That is really exciting stuff.
translation.ja: 今後 どうなるか 本当に楽しみだ

translation.en: Now, who we're dealing with here, you know, they're a high premium brand.
translation.ja: この顧客は 一流の高級ブランドだぞ

translation.en: And so, success here...
translation.ja: 絶対に成功させて―

translation.en: It means that... that we can work with those kinds of high caliber brands.
translation.ja: 高級ブランドに対応できると 世間にアピールしよう

translation.en: That's exactly what I was thinking. If I could just jump in for a second.
translation.ja: 割り込んで悪いが僕も同感だ

translation.en: We've had some fantastic calls with Martin's head, uh, you know,
translation.ja: マーティンズヘッド社が 関心を持ってる

translation.en: - and Traegus Solutions. - Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: トレーガス社もね

translation.en: And if we circle back next week, I think we can close those deals.
translation.ja: 来週 連絡すれば 契約が結べるかも

translation.en: And I would add Hodge to that list, too.
translation.ja: ホッジ社も 興味を示してるわ

translation.en: Hunter and I had a great conversation with them last month,
translation.ja: ホッジ社も 興味を示してるわ 先月 前向きな話ができたの

translation.en: and I wanna circle back with them 'cause I think they're really ready
translation.ja: 先月 前向きな話ができたの きっと依頼を検討してるはず

translation.en: to do some business.
translation.ja: きっと依頼を検討してるはず

translation.en: Thank you, Sonia. I love to know that.
translation.ja: ソニア　朗報ね

translation.en: No problem.
translation.ja: そう願うわ

translation.en: Oh, this is gonna come as no surprise to all you guys, but... it all comes back to the creator.
translation.ja: このキャンペーンの考案者に 感謝しないとな

translation.en: You know? Chris, congrats again on that.
translation.ja: クリス　ありがとう

translation.en: I wonder if you wanna talk... You know, from a content perspective, about...  how that went down?
translation.ja: コンテンツ的な視点から 現在の状況を説明してくれ

translation.en: We were really working with... a great team of creatives,
translation.ja: 制作担当者たちは みんな 才能がある

translation.en: - who I think totally got the product. -
translation.ja: それに 商品を完璧に理解してるよ

translation.en: Sonia... Were you able to connect with the client?
translation.ja: ソニア　顧客と話したか？

translation.en: Not since last week, uh, but...  I'm gonna see Kathy at the event on Tuesday.
translation.ja: 先週から話してないけど 火曜日にキャシーと会う

translation.en: I'm gonna circle around with her to see if they're still ready to engage.
translation.ja: その時に いろいろ確認するわ

translation.en: - If I could just chime in here... -
translation.ja: １つ言わせてくれる？

translation.en: This has no doubt been a success on so many levels, all right?
translation.ja: このキャンペーンは 確かに大成功だけど―

translation.en: - But, from a sales perspective, - I think that we can do better in Q3.
translation.ja: 第３四半期には もっと売上を伸ばせるはず

translation.en: What we need to do is increase the money for these types of projects specifically.
translation.ja: こういうプロジェクトには もっと予算が必要だわ

translation.en: I wanna say...
translation.ja: この契約は―

translation.en: it's possible that this deal pre- dates our new sales goals.
translation.ja: 新たな売上目標を 提示してるのかも

translation.en: - Or at least, - will be made more explicit.
translation.ja: 目標を より具体的にできない？

translation.en: And we can go granular on that on the sales call on Friday.
translation.ja: 金曜日の会議で話し合おう

translation.en: I'll make a note of that.
translation.ja: メモする

translation.en: Here's the thing...
translation.ja: 実は…

translation.en: - - Just real quick, Hunter and Hoyt,
translation.ja: ハンターにホイト

translation.en: if you guys can't hear us right now,
translation.ja: 私たちの声が 聞きにくいなら―

translation.en: it's because we're on this end digging into some fabulous...
translation.ja: 私たちの声が 聞きにくいなら― それはネクタリンのせいよ

translation.en: - nectarines. So tasty, -
translation.ja: それはネクタリンのせいよ 超おいしくて軟らかくて―

translation.en: so supple, so fresh.
translation.ja: 超おいしくて軟らかくて―

translation.en: - Really, really juicy. -
translation.ja: 超ジューシーなの

translation.en: - Oh! - Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 最高よね

translation.en: - - It isn't an issue here. We're hearing you loud and clear.
translation.ja: 問題ないよ はっきり聞こえる

translation.en: Thanks, Hoyt. Hunter?
translation.ja: ハンターは？

translation.en: Same situation here.
translation.ja: 我々もネクタリンを食べてる

translation.en: We've had ourselves . Just let us know
translation.ja: 我々もネクタリンを食べてる 問題があるなら言ってくれ

translation.en: - - if our nectarines become an issue.
translation.ja: 問題があるなら言ってくれ

translation.en: They haven't. It's been fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　問題ない

translation.en: Okay, great, then we're all on the same page.
translation.ja: 意思疎通できてるわね

translation.en: Actually, Hunter, now might be a really good time
translation.ja: ハンター　質問したい

translation.en: to get some developments of what's going on your end, so...
translation.ja: シンガポールの件は どうなった？

translation.en: What's new in Singapore, brother?
translation.ja: 何か展開は？

translation.en: We've gone on really good meetings out here.
translation.ja: 順調に会議を進めてる

translation.en: I wouldn't say anything was closed, but I would say
translation.ja: まだ取引は 成立(クローズ )してないが―

translation.en: - we're close. -
translation.ja: きっと もうすぐ(クロース)だろう

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: マジかよ　面白すぎる！

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - Ah...
translation.ja: 腹が痛い

translation.en: I think that's enough updates for the afternoon.
translation.ja: 今日はここまでだ

translation.en: I just wanna be the first to thank you all for giving us time today.
translation.ja: 貴重な時間を割いてくれて ありがとう

translation.en: - It was our pleasure! Our pleasure. -
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: That's what we're here for.
translation.ja: 会社のためよ

translation.en: Iliza! Brett!
translation.ja: ブレット　来い

translation.en: - Can we get y'all in here? - Here we go. Hit me, baby.
translation.ja: 頼むぞ 私にもお願いね　水をかけて

translation.en: - Hello! - Hit me, hit me!
translation.ja: 私にもお願いね　水をかけて

translation.en: Baby?
translation.ja: ねえ

translation.en: I just don't think we can afford a trip this year.
translation.ja: 今年は旅行する余裕がない

translation.en: Babe. You know I need a vacation.
translation.ja: でも休暇が必要よ

translation.en: I know. This is garbage.
translation.ja: 分かるけど 全部 高すぎる

translation.en: Wait, what is this?
translation.ja: 待って　これは？

translation.en: Paula, look. Come over here. This is insane.
translation.ja: ポーラ　見てくれる？

translation.en: - Hmm? - London for $100.
translation.ja: ロンドンが100ドルよ

translation.en: - What? - Round trip to Maui, - $55. - Wow.
translation.ja: マウイ島は往復で55ドル

translation.en: Two hundred dollars to Shanghai? Ibiza?  Paris?
translation.ja: 上海は200ドルで イビサ島やパリも安いわ

translation.en: - Uh, that's amazing. - Do we love?
translation.ja: すごいわね 本当に びっくりよ

translation.en: It's amazing.
translation.ja: 本当に びっくりよ

translation.en: Yeah. So, okay, wait, wait, wait. What does the fine print say?
translation.ja: ちょっと待って 条件を見ましょ

translation.en: - Some restrictions apply. Okay. - Okay.
translation.ja: “制限あり”ですって

translation.en: Posted fees include tax and do not include additional bag charges.
translation.ja: “税込みで 手荷物料金は含まれない”

translation.en: Also, you may have to kiss your dad for six whole minutes? Blackout dates apply.
translation.ja: “父親へのキスが 必要になる可能性がある”

translation.en: You and your best friend have to get matching haircuts.
translation.ja: “友達と髪形を 同じにすること”

translation.en: Extended leg room offered at an additional charge.
translation.ja: “友達と髪形を 同じにすること” “足元の広い座席は 追加料金”

translation.en: You can only bring one carry- on bag and it must be a hamster.
translation.ja: “足元の広い座席は 追加料金” “手荷物はハムスターのみ”

translation.en: No food is allowed on the flight unless you bring enough for everyone.
translation.ja: “食べ物は 乗客全員分を持ち込むこと”

translation.en: Anyone who says the word me or I or plane
translation.ja: “食べ物は 乗客全員分を持ち込むこと” “「私」と「飛行機」は禁句 言ったらスープ攻めに遭う”

translation.en: will be doused in soup.
translation.ja: “「私」と「飛行機」は禁句 言ったらスープ攻めに遭う”

translation.en: - Uh-- - I'm thinking...
translation.ja: やめましょ

translation.en: - no. - Let's go for it. - - Obviously.
translation.ja: いいえ　買うべきだわ

translation.en: - - Thank you and we do hope you have a good flight.
translation.ja: ご搭乗 ありがとうございます

translation.en: - I'm so glad we did this. - Aw.
translation.ja: 買ってよかった

translation.en: - Paris, baby. -
translation.ja: パリよ　楽しみね

translation.en: I'm glad we're almost halfway there. I'm just gonna, like, grab a little shuteye.
translation.ja: もうすぐ中間点よ 少し眠るわ

translation.en: - Oh, yeah. Do you, babe. - Yeah, baby.
translation.ja: ええ　おやすみ

translation.en: Hello! And welcome!
translation.ja: こんにちは　ようこそ！

translation.en: I'm Cashew Albacore, CEO and inventor of Air Cashew,
translation.ja: 俺はアルバコアだ カシュー航空のＣＥＯだよ

translation.en: the world's first airline owned by just me.
translation.ja: この航空会社を所有するのは 俺だけだ

translation.en: I hope you love adventure because it's time to flew.
translation.ja: 冒険の旅だぞ みんなで飛ぼう

translation.en: - After 30 years... - What? ...in the rat and mustard business,
translation.ja: 俺はドブネズミ産業で 大成功を収め―

translation.en: I saved up enough money to buy my own airline.
translation.ja: 航空会社を買うことができた

translation.en: - Me even designed the uniforms. - Spiffo!
translation.ja: 従業員の制服も 俺のデザインだ

translation.en: Beverage? We have hot soda and warm hair.
translation.ja: 熱いソーダと 温かい毛はいかが？

translation.en: - No, thank you. - Ew.
translation.ja: 結構よ

translation.en: We're committed to staying in the air once we've taken off.
translation.ja: 不時着しないように 全力を尽くす

translation.en: - - And now, it's Pine Cone Time!
translation.ja: では 松ぼっくりの時間だ！

translation.en: Our air is different - - from other airlines,
translation.ja: 我が社は 他の航空会社とは違うが

translation.en: but I won't tell you how.
translation.ja: どう違うかは教えないぞ

translation.en: - We're gonna die! - Gonna die.
translation.ja: 死ぬの？

translation.en: Your words, not mine.
translation.ja: セーフだ “私”と言わなかった

translation.en: I prefer words like
translation.ja: 俺が好きな言葉は “トリュフ豚”

translation.en: truffle pig, hot scrod, goose dust,
translation.ja: 俺が好きな言葉は “トリュフ豚” “熱い白身魚” “ガチョウ粉”

translation.en: - We're gonna die. - and the Spanish word for dream, sueño.
translation.ja: スペイン語で“夢”を意味する “スエニョ”

translation.en: It took a big, hot sueño to sew this plane together.
translation.ja: 大きなスエニョを持って 飛行機の部品を縫い合わせた

translation.en: - Sew? - So,
translation.ja: 縫い合わせた？

translation.en: all our planes are homemade and FDA- certified, nom nom.
translation.ja: 部品はすべて 食品医薬品局に認可されてる

translation.en: I tried to buy my own sports team,
translation.ja: 本当はスポーツチームを 買いたかった

translation.en: but no one wanted to be called the Denver Doodles of Nashville.
translation.ja: でも改名するチームがなく 諦めたよ

translation.en: So I turned my sights to the skies.
translation.ja: それで空を目指すことにした

translation.en: I can't believe this is happening.
translation.ja: 私 夢みてる？

translation.en: - - Did you say I?
translation.ja: “私”と言ったな

translation.en: - - Danni, - in 3C. -
translation.ja: ３Ｃに座ってるダニー

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: Better not complain, or we'll have to wake up the pilot.
translation.ja: 文句を言ったら パイロットを起こすぞ

translation.en: - - Just kidding! It's me,
translation.ja: 冗談さ　俺だ

translation.en: and welcome to Cashew Air,
translation.ja: カシュー航空だぞ

translation.en: the only airline where you can earn...
translation.ja: 点数を稼げる 唯一の航空会社だ

translation.en: So, fasten your meatbelts,
translation.ja: さあ　肉ベルトを締めて―

translation.en: - - and go to sleep,
translation.ja: 眠れ！

translation.en: - - because you're on Cashew Air. Cashew Air!
translation.ja: 君はカシュー航空の 飛行機に乗ってる

translation.en: - Something is wrong with me. -
translation.ja: 俺は おかしいようだ
